text: KOKL (1240 AM) is a radio station broadcasting a Classic hits format, licensed to Okmulgee, Oklahoma. The station is currently owned by Third Day Broadcasting Inc. KOKL's first license, as KHBG, was granted on November 9, 1937."AM Query Results: First license" (FCC.gov) In 1959 the call letters were changed to KOKL."For The Record: Call Letters Assigned", Broadcasting, September 28, 1959, page 126. ==FM Translator== KOKL is also broadcast on the following FM translator: ==References== ==External links== *KOKL Website * * OKL Category:Classic hits radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1937 Category:1937 establishments in Oklahoma
title: KOKL
